articleNo.title: articleNo
articleNo.note: product or article no (can be changes while life cycle)

matchcode.title: matchcode
matchcode.note: Name of the product for fast and easy search  and find

gtin.title: gtin
gtin.note: Global trade item number, a worldwide unique number for the product, can be used for barcode and identification in foreign systems

costCalc.title: costCalc
costCalc.note: Calculated costs of one unit of the product, is set manually or by a custom algorithm

costAvg.title: costAvg
costAvg.note: Average costs of one unit of the product, is calculated each time an amount of units of the product is entering or leaving the stock

costLast.title: costLast
costLast.note: Last purchase price of one unit of the product

costList.title: costList
costList.note: List purchase price of one unit of the product

costInventory.title: costInventory
costInventory.note: Cost for one unit of the product for inventory / stacktaking

netWeight.title: netWeight
netWeight.note: Net weight of one unit of the product measured in kg

grossWeight.title: grossWeight
grossWeight.note: Gross weight of one unit of the product measured in kg

length.title: length
length.note: Length of one unit of the product

width.title: width
width.note: Width of one unit of the product

strength.title: strength
strength.note: Strength of one unit of the product

innerDiameter.title: innerDiameter
innerDiameter.note: Inner diameter of one unit of the product

outerDiameter.title: outerDiameter
outerDiameter.note: Outer diameter of one unit of the product

volume.title: volume
volume.note: Volume of one unit of the product

customsTariff.title: customsTariff
customsTariff.note: Customs traiff number of the product

replacementTime.title: replacementTime
replacementTime.note: Replacement time in days, how long does it take to get the product to stock

isProduction.title: isProduction
isProduction.note: Is the a product that has to be produced?

isWorkStep.title: isWorkStep
isWorkStep.note: Has this product to be treated as a  work-step?

isStockItem.title: isStockItem
isStockItem.note: Must all stock related in and out of this product be related to a storage location?

isStockTracing.title: isStockTracing
isStockTracing.note: Must all stock related in and out of this product be related to a storage location?

isCheckStock.title: isCheckStock
isCheckStock.note: May the product be stored to an inspection stock on receive and before delivery? (for quality management)

isService.title: isService
isService.note: Has this product to be treated as a service?

isPacking.title: isPacking
isPacking.note: Has this product to be treated as a packing?

isConsumable.title: isConsumable
isConsumable.note: Has this product to be treated as a consumable?

isShipping.title: isShipping
isShipping.note: Has this product to be treated as a shipping?

isCharges.title: isSerialNo
isCharges.note: Is this product managed in, and related to charges

isSerialNo.title: isSerialNo
isSerialNo.note: Is this product managed in, and related to serial numbers

isRohsCompliant.title: isRohsCompliant
isRohsCompliant.note: Is this product compiant to the RoHS-policy 2011/65/EU of the European Union?

isReverseCharge.title: isReverseCharge
isReverseCharge.note: Has this product to be treated as a reverse charge product (VAT has to be payed by the buyer)

isDiscount.title: isDiscount
isDiscount.note: Is it allowed to give a discount when selling the product?

isReduction.title: isReduction
isReduction.note: Is the price for the product reduced?

isIntrastat.title: isIntrastat
isIntrastat.note: Is the selling and buying of this product relevant to the EU-policy 638/2004, named intrastat?

isPreferential.title: isPreferential
isPreferential.note: Is the country of origin qualified for preference according to EU-policy 1207/2001, 1617/2006, 75/2008
